data.name: Community Building: Level Up WI
data.location: Ho-Chunk Casino Hotel and Convention Center
data.description: Level Up is a new community event coming to Wisconsin Dells, WI on April 16 & 17 (post-Tax Day!) bringing a whole day of Deep Dive learning about Microsoft Dynamics GP and Power Platform.

relatedRecords.name: Apache DC Roadshow 2020
relatedRecords.description: ApacheCon and Apache Roadshow Events are the place to come learn what Apache projects are doing, as well as a place for projects to come build stronger project communities, and forge bonds between projects.
